oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Scolopostethus affinis (Schilling) (Hemiptera, Heteroptera, Rhyparochromidae, Drymini): a new alien established in North America
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Larson, David J
Scudder, Geoffrey G E
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: invasion biology
Scolopostethus affinis
Hemiptera
Rhyparochromidae
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Scolopostethus affinis, a species native to the Palearctic region, is reported from two localities in Montreal, Quebec. The species appears established and breeding in Quebec and is a new alien species in North America. A description of S. affinis is given, with illustrations, and details of the life cycle and diagnostic characters.
